UADataType.Description: CESMII Smart Manufacturing Profile for Feed Ingredients used in manufacturing work orders. Defines the structure for ingredient materials including product identification, quantities, and weight measurements.

Field.Name: ProductID
Field.Description: Unique identifier for the feed ingredient product

Field.Name: ProductNumber
Field.Description: Numeric product number for the feed ingredient

Field.Name: ProductName
Field.Description: Human-readable name of the feed ingredient product

Field.Name: LotNumber
Field.Description: Lot number for traceability of the feed ingredient batch

Field.Name: UnitOfMeasure
Field.Description: Unit of measure for the quantity (e.g., CS for cases)

Field.Name: Quantity
Field.Description: Quantity of the feed ingredient in the specified unit of measure

Field.Name: WeightUnitOfMeasure
Field.Description: Unit of measure for weight (e.g., lb for pounds)

Field.Name: Weight
Field.Description: Weight of the feed ingredient in the specified weight unit
